content:
好久沒拍MAGI了，希望3月能順利跟哥哥們拍到!
紅玉初登場各種酷霸狂霸跩，一下子就打中我了。
後來突然的一哭更是讓我一箭穿心，這就是反差萌吧!

一直都覺得MAGI裡沒有真正的壞人(惡)
互相敵對的人只是因為立場跟想法有不同
MAGI裡的每個角色都很努力得創造自己的明天以及守護所珍惜的朋友、家園
希望最後能有夠大圓滿的結局T_T

Hi everyone, Long time no see!
Have not done magi photoshooting for a while, I miss Ren Kougyoku so much.
When Ren Kougyoku first show up, I was really attracted by her personality.
She is strong within the fight but still like other teenager girl with fragile heart.
I am really looking forward for the upcoming photoshoot with other ren family on March!

I really think there really is no bad guy within magi.
There are only against each other because they have different point of view and ideal.
Every character was just trying to protect their dream and people around them...
I really hope this manga will have a great ending which everyone happy with.
